text: Ana Luisa Peluffo (born 9 October 1929) is a Mexican actress. She has appeared in more than 200 movies and television shows since 1949. She starred in the 1977 movie Paper Flowers. She also appeared in the 1948 adventure movie Tarzan and the Mermaids. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:People from Quer√©taro
title: Ana Luisa Peluffo
